title: Academic achievement improvement process via inquiry-based English learning materials development

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level proficiency in basic English grammar and reading comprehension
context.additional_context: A blended course where high school students explore university-level mathematical concepts in English, combining digital resource access via personal devices with offline discussion sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can write a 500-word essay explaining mathematical concepts using inquiry-based English materials.
Learners can create a 10-minute presentation on the process of solving math problems in English and receive peer evaluation.
Learners can achieve a 20% or greater improvement in academic performance between pre- and post-test scores after inquiry activities.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Compatible Digital Learning Platform
Expert-Validated Learning Materials (Verified by Media/Language/Instructional Design Experts)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
